sections: This truck can eat most muscle cars for dinner!

Mopar is a name that is very well known in the car community, RAM specifically has gained a reputation for being one of the greatest producers of high horsepower trucks in America. RAM has become infamous for such trucks as the RAM Dakota, Daytona, SRT-10, and most
This insane truck boasts the revered Dodge Hellcat engine pumping out 702 horsepower and 650 lb/ft of torque.

is a step forward for the RAM automotive manufacturer, stuffing big horsepower numbers into muscle cars is a Mopar tradition as old as the company itself. However, putting those same numbers into a truck is absolutely ludicrous.
Luckily, if youâ€™re looking to get your hands on one of these beasts, there is currently an example of such a Mopar monster that is scheduled to be auctioned
. Upon launch, all of the trucks were sold out within hours, and this has led to an extremely inflated value. Due to the limited number of available

, it has become increasingly difficult to obtain these insane muscle trucks. This supercharged demon accelerates from 0-60 mph in just 4.5 seconds and leaves the competitor trucks in the dust. This truck should probably command a high value at auction due to scarcity and anyone who wants one better hurry because it won't take long for someone to pick this truck up.

is so untouched that it still has the packaging plastic on the seats, the odometer only reads a mere 17 miles which is mostly shipping as it is practically impossible to move a truck without starting the engine at some point. Thanks to
you could be the proud owner of this incredibly powerful beast rather than being forced to fantasize about having a truck that makes +700 horsepower. Better move fast before you miss your chance.
